messages.subject: Show on Samurai Swords
messages.msgSnippet: There is going to be a show on the History International channel today at 8:00pm EST and again at 12:00pm EST on samurai swords. Specifically the master
messages.messageBody:
There is going to be a show on the History International channel
today at 8:00pm EST and again at 12:00pm EST on samurai swords.
Specifically the master swordsman, Masamune. Should be worth
watching.

-MissBehavin
